# Hello World
This is my first post using Quarto!

I'm testing that code and visualizations render correctly.


```{python}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
y = [i**2 for i in x]

plt.plot(x, y)
plt.xlabel("x")
plt.ylabel("x squared")
plt.title("Simple Test Plot")
plt.show()

```
